item.title: 印度塔塔通信公司因数据服务需求而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 本周二，印度塔塔通讯公司（Tata Communications）公布第四季度利润增长 15%，主要得益于数据服务需求的增长。【原文：India's Tata Communications reported a 15% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by higher demand for its data services.】

item.title: 穆迪第一季度业绩稳健，因市场波动下调盈利预期
item.description: 穆迪周二公布第一季度利润增长，主要得益于其分析部门的强劲发展势头和债券发行量的回升。【原文：Moody's reported higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday, on strong momentum in its analytics unit and a pickup in bond issuance, but it tempered expectations for the year due to the market volatility.】

item.title: 券商普遍看好英伟达支持的 CoreWeave
item.description: 华尔街券商周二开始对英伟达（Nvidia）支持的 CoreWeave 公司进行报道，并普遍看好该公司的前景，尽管该公司在首次公开募股和首次上市后表现平平，未能获得投资者的青睐。【原文：Wall Street brokerages on Tuesday began coverage of Nvidia-backed CoreWeave with broadly bullish views, although the stock has failed to gain traction with investors following a lackluster initial public offering and market debut.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货因油价和金价上涨而上涨
item.description: 受大宗商品价格上涨提振，加拿大主要股指期货周二上涨，在前一交易日暴跌后反弹。【原文：Futures for Canada's main stock index rose on Tuesday, bouncing back after the index tumbled in the previous session, boosted by gains in commodity prices.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司季度利润因国防需求回升而增长
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周二公布第一季度利润增长，并重申了对今年的预测，原因是对其导弹系统和战斗机的需求保持强劲。【原文：Lockheed Martin reported a higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday and reaffirmed its forecasts for the year on the back of resilient demand for its missile systems and fighter jets.】

item.title: 少数股东表示，石油集团 Equinor 必须对气候差异做出解释
item.description: 一群小股东周二表示，挪威 Equinor 公司董事会必须解释该公司提高石油和天然气产量的计划如何与其对遏制气候变化的巴黎协议所做的承诺保持一致。【原文：The board of Norway's Equinor must explain how the company's plan to raise oil and gas production aligns with its stated commitment to the Paris agreement on curbing climate change, a group of minority shareholders said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 产品需求强劲，MSCI 第一季度利润增长
item.description: 指数提供商摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI）周二公布第一季度利润增长，原因是客户支出的增加推动了对其指数产品和分析服务的需求。【原文：Index provider MSCI reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as improved spending by clients drove up demand for its index products and analytics services.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司因 B-21 损失利润减半，股价暴跌
item.description: 诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）周二公布的第一季度利润下降了 49%，原因是该美国承包商的 B-21 隐形轰炸机项目因制造成本上升而出现亏损，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了约 7%。【原文：Northrop Grumman posted a 49% drop in first-quarter profit on Tuesday as the U.S. contractor booked losses on its B-21 stealth bomber program due to higher manufacturing costs, sending its shares down about 7% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 汇丰中国最高财富银行家调任，亚洲财富主管迁至上海
item.description: 汇丰银行负责中国业务的高级财富管理经理将在不久后的亚洲领导层调整中离职，该银行还将在中国的数字财富项目中裁减数百个职位。【原文：HSBC's top wealth manager overseeing China will leave the role soon in an Asian leadership reshuffle, as the lender also cuts hundreds of jobs from its digital wealth project in China.】

item.title: 印度 Airtel 公司将从阿达尼公司购买 5G 频谱
item.description: 印度电信运营商巴帝电信公司（Bharti Airtel）周二表示，该公司将从阿达尼企业（Adani Enterprises）旗下一家公司购买 5G 电信频谱。【原文：Indian telecom operator Bharti Airtel will buy 5G telecom spectrum from a unit of Adani Enterprises , the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行称董事会建议 2024 年派发创纪录股息
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行储蓄银行（Sberbank）周二表示，董事会建议支付创纪录的 7869 亿卢布（96.8 亿美元）股息。【原文：Russia's largest lender Sberbank said on Tuesday that its board recommended paying a record high 786.9 billion roubles ($9.68 billion) in dividends.】

item.title: 关税将推高成本，金佰利下调年度利润预期
item.description: 金佰利公司周二下调了年度利润预期，因为这家面巾纸生产商警告说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的广泛贸易关税将推高其供应链成本。【原文：Kimberly-Clark slashed its annual profit forecast on Tuesday as the Kleenex tissue maker warned that U.S. President Donald Trump's broad-based trade tariffs would push up its supply-chain costs.】

item.title: 巴里克黄金公司将以 11 亿美元的价格向约翰-保尔森和 NovaGold 出售阿拉斯加矿山股份
item.description: 加拿大巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）周二表示，将以不超过 11 亿美元的价格向亿万富翁约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）和新星黄金资源公司（NovaGold Resources）出售其持有的阿拉斯加 Donlin 黄金项目 50%的股份，从而退出该项目。【原文：Canada's Barrick Gold said on Tuesday it will exit the Donlin Gold Project in Alaska by selling its 50% stake to billionaire John Paulson and NovaGold Resources for up to $1.1 billion.】

item.title: PulteGroup 季度业绩超出预期，激励措施提升了住房需求
item.description: 周二，PulteGroup 的第一季度利润和收入均超出华尔街预期，原因是该公司的激励措施有助于改善住房需求。【原文：PulteGroup's first-quarter profit and revenue beat Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as the company's incentives helped improve housing demand.】

item.title: RTX 因喷气机服务需求强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: RTX 公司周二公布第一季度利润增长，并重申了其年度展望，原因是喷气机维修和维护服务的强劲需求帮助抵消了该公司国防部门销售额的疲软。【原文：RTX reported a higher first-quarter profit and reaffirmed its annual outlook on Tuesday, as strong demand for jet repair and maintenance services helped offset weaker sales in the company's defense unit.】

item.title: Verizon 因涨价和竞争导致用户流失增加
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications）第一季度流失的无线用户数量超过了华尔街的预期，因为这家美国电信巨头正在努力应对最近竞争对手提价和积极促销所带来的影响。【原文：Verizon Communications lost more wireless subscribers in the first quarter than Wall Street expected, as the U.S. telecom giant grappled with the fallout of recent price hikes and aggressive promotions from rivals.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿第一季度利润因北美钻井市场疲软而下滑
item.description: 哈里伯顿公司周二公布的第一季度利润下降，原因是北美钻井活动放缓抑制了对其油田服务和设备的需求。【原文：Halliburton posted lower first-quarter profit on Tuesday as a slowdown in drilling activity in North America dampened demand for its oilfield services and equipment.】

item.title: 美国 "主要失败者 "报到
item.description: 美国早报【原文：Morning Bid U.S.】

item.title: 据报纸报道，中国要求韩国不要向美国国防公司出口使用稀土的产品
item.description: 韩国经济日报》周二援引政府和公司消息来源报道称，中国政府最近要求韩国公司不要向美国国防公司出口含有中国稀土矿产品。【原文：Beijing recently asked South Korean companies not to export products containing China's rare earth minerals to U.S. defense firms, the Korea Economic Daily reported on Tuesday, citing government and company sources.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势下，3M下调2025年利润预期
item.description: 由于关税紧张局势加剧，美国工业集团3M公司周二下调了2025年的利润预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌2.5%。【原文：U.S. industrial conglomerate 3M Co cut its forecast for 2025 profit on Tuesday as tariff tensions mount, sending its shares down 2.5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）第一季度利润因维护需求增加而增长
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团周二公布第一季度利润增长，原因是新飞机的持续短缺促使航空公司继续使用旧飞机，从而推动了对高利润售后零部件和服务的强劲需求。【原文：GE Aerospace reported a higher first-quarter profit on Tuesday, as a persistent shortage of new aircraft pushes airlines to keep older jets in service, driving strong demand for high-margin aftermarket parts and services.】

item.title: Regeneron 与合同药品制造商签署 30 亿美元协议，以促进美国生产
item.description: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals 公司周二表示，它已与合同药品开发商 Fujifilm Diosynth 达成了一项价值超过 30 亿美元的交易，以扩大其在美国的生产能力。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals said on Tuesday it had entered into a deal valued at more than $3 billion with contract drug developer Fujifilm Diosynth to expand its U.S. manufacturing capacity.】

item.title: 美股期货在大跌后反弹；企业盈利成为焦点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的批评激怒了投资者，美国股指期货周二上涨，在前一交易日股市暴跌后反弹。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Tuesday, bouncing back after equities tumbled in the previous session, when President Donald Trump's criticism of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell rattled investors.】

item.title: 巴西的可可大王希望通过巨型农场彻底改变可可产业
item.description: 在巴西巴伊亚州，农民莫伊塞斯-施密特（Moises Schmidt）正在开发世界上最大的可可农场。【原文：In the Brazilian state of Bahia, farmer Moises Schmidt is developing the world's largest cocoa farm.】

item.title: 特斯拉投资者等待有关经济型电动汽车和提高销量计划的详细信息
item.description: 特斯拉的投资者急切地想知道，今年推出廉价汽车和机器人出租车服务的计划是否步入正轨，首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）是否准备很快放弃在特朗普政府中的角色，重新更紧密地管理公司。【原文：Tesla investors are anxious to know if plans to roll out a cheaper car and a robotaxi service this year are on track, and whether CEO Elon Musk is ready to ditch his role in the Trump administration soon and get back to managing the company more closely.】

item.title: 英特尔业绩凸显新任首席执行官谭群钊扭转多年失误的策略
item.description: 英特尔的季度财报将最清晰地展示新任首席执行官陈立武为这家陷入困境的美国芯片制造商制定的扭亏战略，投资者希望看到他正在扭转多年战略失误的早期迹象。【原文：Intel's quarterly results will offer the clearest look yet at new CEO Lip-Bu Tan's turnaround strategy for the embattled American chipmaker, and investors are hoping for early signs that he is reversing years of strategic lapses.】

item.title: Elevance 确认季度利润增长，重申 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 医疗保险公司 Elevance Health 周二表示，其第一季度利润高于市场预期，与上周发布的初步预期持平，而在此之前，风向标联合健康（UnitedHealth）下调了全年业绩预期，引发了该行业的大跌。【原文：Health insurer Elevance Health said on Tuesday its first-quarter profit came above Street expectations, matching the preliminary estimates it released last week after bellwether UnitedHealth's lowered full-year forecast triggered a selloff in the sector.】

item.title: 聚焦：消息人士称，特朗普正考虑将美国药价降至国际水平
item.description: 据两位公司消息人士称，制药行业最关心的问题是特朗普政府正在考虑将美国药品价格与其他发达国家支付的较低金额挂钩。【原文：Drugmakers have been warned that the Trump Administration is considering linking U.S. medicine prices to lower amounts paid by other developed countries, according to two company sources who called the option the pharmaceutical industry's top concern.】

item.title: 许多在美国的加拿大 "雪鸟 "希望打包飞往北方--一劳永逸
item.description: 今年春天，计划出售其在阳光明媚的佛罗里达州和亚利桑那州的第二套住房的加拿大 "雪鸟 "数量激增，他们中的许多人因为美国和加拿大之间的关系突然变冷而打消了出售的念头。【原文：The number of Canadian "snowbirds" planning to sell their second homes in sunny Florida and Arizona has surged this spring, many of them put off by the sudden chill that has blanketed relations between their homeland and the U.S.】

item.title: 投资者担心特朗普对鲍威尔的攻击会加剧痛苦
item.description: 投资者担心，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普试图解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），削弱人们对央行抗击通胀和独立行事能力的信心，资产价格将受到沉重打击。【原文：Investors are fearful of a deep hit to asset prices if U.S. President Donald Trump attempts to fire Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, undermining confidence in the central bank's ability to fight inflation and act independently.】
